definition: Latin/(in former times) to press-gang/to kidnap and force people into service
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
Aladdin, character in one of the tales in the The Book of One Thousand and One Nights
Kuala Terengganu, capital of Terengganu state, Malaysia

sentences.english: Onchocerciasis is limited to six Latin American countries.
sentences.chinese: 盘尾丝虫病仅在6个拉丁美洲国家存在。

sentences.english: Please enjoy the Latin dance "Joyful Cowboy".
sentences.chinese: 请欣赏拉丁舞《快乐牛仔》。

sentences.english: Latin America has a couple of candidates, but they are trailing.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁美洲有许多候选人，但是他们正在落后。

sentences.english: Teutonic, based on an old Latin quote, or
sentences.chinese: 它来自条顿语，这一猜测基于一条古拉丁语的引述。

sentences.english: So the hippodrome is the circus in Latin.
sentences.chinese: 所以赛马场就是拉丁语中的马戏表演场。

sentences.english: They knew my work as a religious producer in Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 他们知道我在拉丁美洲地区是一名宗教制片人。

sentences.english: Please consider to remove the Latin fonts prior to the CJK fonts.
sentences.chinese: 请考虑移除排在CJK字型前面的拉丁字型。

sentences.english: Madame de Genlis was superstitious and a Latinist.
sentences.chinese: 让利斯夫人有些迷信而且还是个拉丁语学者。
在拉丁文中，Septem是“七”的意思。

sentences.english: The next day, when we watched “Aladdin, ” she let me be Princess Jasmine.
sentences.chinese: 转天，我们一起看“阿拉丁”时，她让我做茉莉公主。

sentences.english: For a long period of time Latin was the literary language of Italy.
sentences.chinese: 在很长一段时间里，拉丁语是意大利的文学语言。

sentences.english: That's the Latin poem that was assigned for today's class.
sentences.chinese: 就是今天这节课我们要学的这首拉丁文诗歌。

sentences.english: The sword did its work quickly, and Abanazar never opened his eyes again.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉丁手起剑落，阿巴那扎尔就再也没有睁开眼睛了。

sentences.english: The participial constructions are employed much more in Latin than they are in English.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁文较英文有更多使用分词结构的句子。

sentences.english: The litter went past Aladdin, but for some minutes he did not move.
sentences.chinese: 轿子过去好一会儿了，阿拉丁还是待在那儿没有动。
下面请欣赏激情澎湃《拉丁舞》。
